entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 10:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -32.5°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -36.4°C
Wind: SW 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 31.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
